edu.washington.cs.cse490h.lib
Class NodeServer

java.lang.Object
  edu.washington.cs.cse490h.lib.NodeServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class NodeServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

In a separate thread, this class listens to incoming messages from the router and stores the data received.

Constructor Detail

NodeServer

public NodeServer(java.lang.String name,
                  int port,
                  Emulator parent)
           throws java.io.IOException
Creates a new NodeServer.

Parameters:
name - The name of the machine on which the router resides
port - The port on which the router is listening
parent - The emulator that this server is associated to
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is a problem creating the socket
